author: cnbc.com
title: DentalPlans.com CCO Elected Chairperson of Consumer Health Alliance Board
text:
Jenn Stoll Brings Years of Industry Experience to New Board of Directors Role
PLANTATION, Fla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- DentalPlans.com , a leading online consumer marketplace for dental savings plans, is proud to announce that the company’s Chief Commercial Officer, Jenn Stoll, has been elected Chairperson of the Consumer Health Alliance ’s Board of Directors.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: http://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180212005747/en/
DentalPlans.com 's Chief Commercial Officer, Jenn Stoll, has been elected Chairperson of the Consumer Health Alliance’s Board of Directors. (Photo: Business Wire)
“We’ve had the honor of working with Jenn and DentalPlans.com for several years. We look forward to working with them in this new capacity and further leveraging Jenn’s expertise and endless enthusiasm for delivering truly affordable healthcare options,” said Consumer Health Alliance President Allen Erenbaum.
The Consumer Health Alliance (CHA) is the national trade association for non-insurance discount healthcare programs. Founded in 2001, CHA serves to educate consumers and regulators about the benefits of non-insurance discount healthcare programs, promote programs that operate in a consumer-friendly manner, and work with state legislators and regulators to ensure that regulation of the industry protects consumers' right to access affordable healthcare services at discounted rates.
“Jenn’s experience in the direct to consumer healthcare market will bring significant insights to CHA members, as well as businesses interested in providing affordable benefits packages to their employees and consumers,” said Erenbaum.
DentalPlans.com has been a member of CHA for 10 years, and Stoll has served on CHA’s Board of Directors since 2011.
“I am so excited about this new opportunity to increase access to affordable, quality dental care for consumers and businesses,” said Stoll. “CHA has been a driving force in our industry for over a decade and has made huge contributions in fostering the greater understanding and acceptance of healthcare payment alternatives.”
CHA board members include representatives from Careington International, Coverdell, and New Benefits. CHA’s members provide discount healthcare plans to nearly 27 million Americans nationwide.
“I look forward to having a strong voice in ensuring consumers benefit from the industry compliance and regulatory standards that CHA drives,” Stoll added. “Helping to ensure that all of our stakeholders – industry members and the people and companies that we serve - are valued, respected and delighted is critically important to me – that’s the DentalPlans.com business model and I know how well it works.”
DentalPlans.com was recently named one of the "2018 Best Places to Work in South Florida," by the South Florida Business Journal. For more information on the company and its offerings, visit DentalPlans.com .
About DentalPlans.com
DentalPlans.com , founded in 1999, is a leading dental and health savings online marketplace in the U.S., helping more than a million people to affordably access quality healthcare services. Our mission is to empower consumers with the tools, information, and services that they need to live happier, healthier lives. www.dentalplans.com .
About the Consumer Health Alliance
The Consumer Health Alliance (CHA) is the national trade association for discount health care programs. Founded in 2001, CHA serves to educate consumers and regulators about the benefits of non-insurance discount health care programs, promote consumer-friendly business practices, and work with state legislators and regulators to ensure that regulation of the industry protects consumers' right to access affordable health care services at discounted rates.
